title: The lavves resolutions of womens rights: or, The lavves prouision for woemen A methodicall collection of such statutes and customes, with the cases, opinions, arguments and points of learning in the lavv, as doe properly concerne women. Together with a compendious table, whereby the chiefe matters in this booke contained, may be the more readily found.
author: Edgar, Thomas, lawyer.
publisher: Printed by [Miles Flesher for] the assignes of Iohn More Esq. and are to be sold by Iohn Groue, at his shop neere the Rowles in Chancery-Lane, over against the Sixe-Clerkes-Office,
notes: Sometimes attributed to Sir John Doddridge.
Editor's note "To the reader" signed: T.E., i.e. Thomas Edgar?.
Preface signed "I.L.", who states that the material was "long since collected" and that the author is dead.
Running title reads: The womans lawyer.
Variant: imprint has ".. Printed by the assignment of Iohn More Esquire ..".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
